name: Crypt of Capitalism
description:
Made  in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47!

A short game about getting stuck in a loop of purchasing microtransactions. I (@Lychee) did the code, @AFestiveDolphin did art, and @Guff did music!

Due to code issues and too big of an initial scope the levels aren’t really in the state I wanted, but at least it’s working (mostly)! I feel like I have a lot to improve on still, but I learned a lot and had fun. :)
